ygData.subject: RE: Clerical Items
ygData.msgSnippet: that s in the PoF (Plane of Fear)  which is what I said to discount :) Paly s and Tanks can get items by lvl 20 that are THIERS only...as can most
ygData.messageBody:
that's in the PoF (Plane of Fear) which is what I said to discount :)
Paly's and Tanks can get items by lvl 20 that are THIERS only...as can most
classes....which is why I it kinda peeves me about how Clerics are treated
sometimes....

-----Original Message-----
From: Allsar [mailto:bogey@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 2:07 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Clerical Items


There is the ethereal armor which is cleric only
Allsar Olath`Vlos - Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: Ralph Carothers < CarothersR@...
<mailto:CarothersR@...> >
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <mailto:'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'> <
EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <mailto:EQ-Clerics@onelist.com> >
Date: Monday, August 23, 1999 10:20 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Clerical Items



ok, this may seem kinda moot to bring up....but has anyone found (next to
in Plane of Fear) any CLERIC only items?

i bring this up because after going through EQlizer again...i find the:

Polished Mithril Torque


its got +13 int AND wis....and War, Pal, Rog, Brd, Shd, Rng and MNK can wear
it. That's it. A Cleric cant wear a piece of armor a Ranger even could,
and that a MONK can, which would give him his prime requiste, yet classes
which shouldnt be touching this are. (Monk, how many wear anything with 4
weight? not .4, but 4, when they cant really go above 14!!!)

Its lil things like this that really get to me about how Verant works. Was
just wondering how all you other clerics felt...and if you knew who we could
posibly contact in Verant to maybe fix some of the lil oversites!!!!

Bann Sidhe

lvl 24 cleric Fennin Ro
